text:
Beckham pays touching tributes

Former soccer star David Beckham has paid touching tributes to both his wife Victoria Beckham and his mother Sandra West on Mother’s Day. Alongside a black and white picture of the children, he wrote on Instagram, “17 years ago our brood started and these little ones have the most amazing mummy that they love so much ... And I love her for many reasons but the main one is because she gave me the most amazing children ... Happy mama’s day as the little ones would say.”

David also took the time to pay tribute to his “number one fan,” his own mother. — PTI
title: ENT-BECKHAM
